name: microserver-less
description: Backend design pattern for Google Cloud App Engine, AWS Lambda and Docker

scripts.build-src: npm run eslint && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc && ./node_modules/.bin/grunt copy && cp package.json dest/
scripts.docker: docker build --rm -t cassandra/user . && docker run --rm -it --name cassandra.user.v1 -p 4001:4001 cassandra/user:latest
scripts.production: docker build --rm -t cassandra/user . && docker run --rm -d --name cassandra.user.v1 -p 4001:4001 cassandra/user:latest
scripts.deploy-gcp: npm run build-src && cd dest && gcloud app deploy --project testengine18238
scripts.deploy-sls: npm run build-src && cd dest && npm install --only=production && sls deploy
scripts.commit: git push origin dev && git checkout master && git merge dev && git push origin master && git checkout dev

author: Nicheal Pham
